title: 1.15.2服务器的草方块不能蔓延
author: Seanxu20233
txt_content:
用的是paper端，草方块不能蔓延
bukkit.yml内的grass-spread-tick-rate已经从1改成6了
装的插件有：
ColorMOTD,CoreProtect,CS-CoreLib,Essentials,EssentialsChat,EssentialsProtect,
EssentialsSpawn,GroupManager,GSit,HeadDatabase,HolographicDisplays,
LightAPI,Multiverse-Core,PlaceholderAPI,PluginConstructorAPI,PlugMan,ProtocolLib, ScriptBlockPlus,Shopkeepers,SQLibrary,UltimateTimber,Vault,VexView

世界的规则
doFireTick: false, maxCommandChainLength:65536, fireDamage: true, reducedDebugInfo: false, disableElytraMovementCheck: false,announceAdvancements: true, drowningDamage: true, commandBlockOutput: false, doMobSpawning:true, maxEntityCramming: 24, disableRaids: false, doWeatherCycle: true, doDaylightCycle:true, showDeathMessages: true, doTileDrops: true, doInsomnia: true, doImmediateRespawn:false, naturalRegeneration: true, doMobLoot: true, fallDamage: true, keepInventory:false, doEntityDrops: true, doLimitedCrafting: false, mobGriefing: false, randomTickSpeed:3, spawnRadius: 10, doTraderSpawning: true, logAdminCommands: false, spectatorsGenerateChunks:true, sendCommandFeedback: true, doPatrolSpawning: true

replies.author: Salt_lovely
replies.txt_content:
grass-spread-tick-rate应该是在paper.yml里面的吧。。而且数字越小，蔓延速度越快。。。

插件列表和世界规则没看出什么问题，农作物照常生长吗？

replies.author: 南柯郡守
replies.txt_content:
听说下雨天草方块蔓延更快哦

(没有依据

replies.author: Seanxu20233
replies.txt_content:
Salt_lovely 发表于 2020-5-12 16:43
grass-spread-tick-rate应该是在paper.yml里面的吧。。而且数字越小，蔓延速度越快。。。
 ...
啊，是数字越小蔓延越快，我调到3就好了，谢谢！但是1就没法蔓延不知道为啥。

replies.author: Seanxu20233
replies.txt_content:

我怀疑你在水贴，但我又不敢说
